pkgmetadata.longdescription: # attmap[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/pepkit/attmap.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/pepkit/attmap)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/pepkit/attmap/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/pepkit/attmap?branch=master)Key-value Mapping supporting nesting and attribute-style accessOriginally motivated by and designed for the [pepkit family projects](https://pepkit.github.io/).
